debates.showAs: Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to empower the Minister for Finance to make regulations imposing certain restrictive measures in respect of securities issued by or on behalf of the State of Israel; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chumhachtú don Aire Airgeadais rialacháin a dhéanamh lena bhforchuirfear bearta sriantacha áirithe i leith urrúis arna n-eisiúint ag Stát Iosrael nó thar a cheann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bearta Sriantacha Airgeadais (Stát Iosrael), 2025

debates.showAs: Judicial Council (Amendment) Bill 2021: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Judicial Council (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Judicial Council (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Judicial Council (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for amendments to the Judicial Council Act 2019, to provide for the making of regulations to require insurance providers to provide information to the Central Bank of Ireland relating to the effect of personal injuries guidelines and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe ar an Acht um Chomhairle na mBreithiúna, 2019, do dhéanamh socrú chun rialacháin a dhéanamh lena gceanglófar ar sholáthraithe árachais faisnéis a bhaineann le héifeacht treoirlínte maidir le díobhálacha pearsanta a sholáthar do Bhanc Ceannais na hÉireann agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhairle na mBreithiúna (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Insurance (Restriction on Differential Pricing and Profiling) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Insurance (Restriction on Differential Pricing and Profiling) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Insurance (Restriction on Differential Pricing and Profiling) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the discriminatory pricing of certain insurance premiums payable by certain persons to the extent that such pricing is on the basis that any such  person is a pre-existing customer of an insurance provider, to prohibit the use of profiling techniques in the calculation of such insurance premiums to determine whether or not  such customer or class of customers are likely, or the extent to which any such customer is likely, to renew the policy concerned, to restrict the use of such profiling techniques by insurance providers in respect of new or potential customers and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc praghsáil idirdhealaitheach a dhéanamh ar phréimheanna árachais áirithe is iníoctha ag daoine áirithe a mhéid gur ar an mbonn gur custaiméir a bheidh ann cheana de chuid soláthraí árachais aon duine den sórt sin, do thoirmeasc teicníochtaí próifílithe a úsáid le linn préimheanna den sórt sin a ríomh d’fhonn a chinneadh cibé acu is dóigh nó nach dóigh, nó a mhéid is dóigh, go ndéanfaidh custaiméir den sórt sin, nó aicme custaiméirí den sórt sin, an polasaí lena mbaineann a athnuachan, do chur srian le húsáid teicníochtaí próifílithe den sórt sin ag soláthraithe árachais i leith custaiméirí nua nó ionchasacha agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Insurance (Restriction on Differential Pricing and Profiling) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Árachais (Srian le Praghsáil Dhifreálach agus Próifíliú), 2021

debates.showAs: Regulation of Lobbying (Amendment) Bill 2020: Referral to Select Committee
Regulation of Lobbying (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Regulation of Lobbying (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for amendments to the Regulation of Lobbying Act 2015, to extend the definition of persons to which the Act applies, to allow the Commission to provide directions on communication, to provide that the Code of Conduct be laid before the Oireachtas; to provide the Commission with further powers to investigate and report on breaches of the Code of Conduct; to extend the cooling-off period to two years, to extend the scope of section 22 of the Regulation of Lobbying Act 2015 and to make a failure to comply with that section an offence; to ensure that Designated Public Officials are aware of post-employment obligations; to allow the Commission to publish certain details regarding its decisions to waive or reduce the cooling-off; to provide for anti-avoidance clause be added to the list of relevant contraventions, and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe ar an Acht um Brústocaireacht a Rialáil, 2015 chun an míniú ar dhaoine lena mbaineann an tAcht a leathnú, chun a cheadú don Choimisiún ordacháin a sholáthar maidir le cumarsáid, chun socrú a dhéanamh go leagfar an Cód Iompair faoi bhráid an Oireachtais; do thabhairt cumhachtaí breise don Choimisiún chun imscrúdú a dhéanamh ar sháruithe ar an gCód Iompair agus chun tuarascáil a thabhairt ar an gcéanna; chun an tréimhse mharana a fhadú go dtí dhá bhliain, chun raon feidhme alt 22 den Acht um Brústocaireacht a Rialáil, 2015 a leathnú agus do dhéanamh cion de mhainneachtain an t-alt sin a chomhlíonadh; dá chinntiú go mbeidh Oifigigh Phoiblí Ainmnithe ar an eolas faoi oibleagáidí iarfhostaíochta; dá cheadú don Choimisiún mionsonraí áirithe a fhoilsiú maidir lena bhreitheanna an tréimhse mharana a tharscaoileadh nó a laghdú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le clásal frithsheachanta a chur leis an liosta de sháruithe iomchuí, agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Brústocaireacht a Rialáil (Leasú), 2020

debates.showAs: No Consent, No Sale Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
No Consent, No Sale Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
No Consent, No Sale Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that Lenders may not transfer mortgages on residential property without the consent of the borrower and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú nach bhféadfaidh Iasachtóirí morgáistí ar mhaoin chónaithe a aistriú gan toiliú an iasachtaí a fháil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosc ar Dhíol gan Toiliú, 2019

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Child and Family Agency Act 2013 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta fán nGníomhaireacht um Leanaí agus an Teaghlach, 2013 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Child and Family Agency (Foster Care Oversight) Bill 2018

debates.showAs: Údarás na Gaeltachta (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for democratic elections to Údarás na Gaeltachta and for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toghcháin dhaonlathacha 
chun Údarás na Gaeltachta agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás na Gaeltachta (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to extend the application of Part IIIC of the Central Bank Act 1942 to provide powers to the Central Bank to conduct inquiries into the suspected provision of false or misleading information to it and to provide for the administrative sanctions that may be imposed by the Central Bank for the provision of false or misleading information to it; to create an offence of providing false or misleading information to the Central Bank; to amend the Central Bank Act 1942 for those purposes; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leathnú fheidhm Chuid IIIC d'Acht an Bhainc Cheannais, 1942 d'fhonn cumhachtaí a thabhairt don Bhanc Ceannais chun fiosrúcháin a sheoladh maidir le soláthar amhrasta faisnéise bréagaí nó míthreoraí dó agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na smachtbhannaí riaracháin a fhéadfaidh an Banc Ceannais a fhorchur mar gheall ar fhaisnéis bhréagach nó mhíthreorach a sholáthar dó; do chruthú cion arb éard é faisnéis bhréagach nó mhíthreorach a sholáthar don Bhanc Ceannais; do leasú Acht an Bhainc Cheannais, 1942 chun na gcríoch sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille an Bhainc Ceannais (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Multi-Party Actions Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for certain procedural and other changes in civil actions so as to provide for the bringing of Multi-Party Actions; to reduce the cost of litigation; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathruithe áirithe ar an nós imeachta agus le hathruithe áirithe eile i gcaingne sibhialta d'fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le Caingne Ilpháirtí a thionscnamh; do laghdú an chostais a bhaineann le dlíthíocht; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaingne Ilpháirtí, 2017

Island Fisheries (Heritage Licence) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the issuing of heritage licences to island fishermen to facilitate the continuance of traditional fishing practices on ireland's offshore islands; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceadúnais oidhreachta a eisiúint chuig iascairí oileáin chun go n-éascófar leanúint de chleachtais iascaireachta thraidisiúnta ar na hoileáin amach ó chósta na hÉireann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Iascach Oileáin (Ceadúnas Oidhreachta), 2017

debates.showAs: Consumer Protection (Regulation of Credit Servicing Firms) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the protection of certain borrowers who are parties to credit agreements in respect of which the owners of the credit are unregulated through the regulation of the owners of the credit; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cosaint a thabhairt d'iasachtaithe áirithe is páirtithe i gcomhaontuithe creidmheasa, ar ina leith atá úinéirí an chreidmheasa gan rialáil, trí úinéirí an chreidmheasa a rialáil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí (Gnólachtaí Seirbhísithe Creidmheasa a Rialáil) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Civil Law (Missing Persons) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the effects in civil law of persons who are missing, including arrangements for interim management of the missing person's property, and to provide for the civil status of the missing person where the circumstances of their absence leads to a presumption of death; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, sa dlí sibhialta, maidir le hearraí daoine atá ar iarraidh, lena n-áirítear socruithe chun bainistiú eatramhach a dhéanamh ar mhaoin an duine atá ar iarraidh, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le stádas sibhialta an duine atá ar iarraidh i gcás go mbeidh toimhde báis ann de dheasca imthosca a n-asláithreachta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Dlí Sibhialta (Daoine atá ar Iarraidh) (Uimh. 2), 2016

Central Bank (Mortgage Interest Rates) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide the Central Bank with the power to direct the covered institutions to lower mortgage interest rates in certain circumstances
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an chumhacht a thabhairt don Bhanc Ceannais a ordú do na forais chumhdaithe rátaí úis morgáiste a laghdú in imthosca áirithe
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille an Bhainc Ceannais (Rátaí Úis Morgáiste) 2015

bill.longTitleEn: in the public interest, to provide for the reduction of the remuneration of members of the Government and members of the Houses of the Oireachtas
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, chun laghdú a dhéanamh ar luach saothair chomhaltaí an Rialtais agus chomhaltaí Thithe an Oireachtais
